title: Cloud Internet Services docs
introduction: IBM Cloud Internet Services, powered by Cloudflare, provides a fast, highly performant, reliable, and secure internet service for customers running their business on IBM Cloud.

section_recommended.title: Learn about CIS features
section_recommended.description: Read about the features included in Cloud Internet Services.

section_recommended.title: Getting CIS running with a new subdomain
section_recommended.description: Practice using CIS with a subdomain or CNAME.

section_recommended.title: Plan comparison
section_recommended.description: Compare available plans available for CIS.
section_recommended.href: IBM Cloud Internet Services offers several plans to choose from: Free Trial, Standard, and Enterprise variations.

tiles.title: Update Logpush UI and include support for Log Analysis. Add UI support for alerting.
tiles.description: Added Log Analysis instance support to the UI for creating and configuring Logpush jobs. Added UI support for creating and managing alerts.

tiles.title: Add Log Analysis integration to logpush API and CLI.
tiles.description: Added Log Analysis instance support to the API and CLI for creating and configuring Logpush jobs.

tiles.title: Add security alerts API.
tiles.description: Added API for creating and configuring security alerts.
